title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 87.1 - Exhibit g-1: total gas supply
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 87.1 - Exhibit g-1: total gas supply

State Regulations

The applicant shall submit a statement of the total maximum
daily and annual volumes of gas committed to it by contract and the maximum
daily and annual volumes of gas available to it from its own peak shaving or
local sources. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
87.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
